meanings.definition: Having the characteristics or qualities of rural life.
meanings.sent1: The countryfied house had a cozy, farmhouse feel.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the countryfied lifestyle over city living.
meanings.sent3: The countryfied scarecrow in the field seemed to wave at passersby.
meanings.sent4: Her countryfied charm was as warm as a summer breeze.
meanings.sent5: The countryfied landscape was painted with rolling hills and grazing cows.

meanings.definition: To make something more rustic or rural in appearance or style.
meanings.sent1: They countryfied their backyard by adding a wooden fence and a vegetable garden.
meanings.sent2: He decided to countryfy the old barn by painting it red and adding a porch swing.
meanings.sent3: She countryfied her outfit by wearing denim overalls and a straw hat to the party.
meanings.sent4: The chef countryfied the menu by adding traditional Southern dishes to the restaurant.
meanings.sent5: The interior designer countryfied the living room with plaid curtains and vintage furniture.
